titleStmt.title: Advice to readers of the common prayer, and the people attending the same. With a preface concerning divine worship. Humbly offered to consideration, for promoting the greater decency and solemnity in performing the offices of God's publick worship, administered according to the order established by law amongst us / by a well-meaning (though unlearned) layick of the Church of England. T.S.
titleStmt.author: T. S. (Thomas Seymour)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Sam. Crouch, at the Corner of Popes Head-Alley, next Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Includes frontispiece: The House of Prayer.
Reproduction of original in: Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland). Library.

place.placeName: the Corner of Popes Head-Alley, next Cornhil
